mapper.update: /* 정산대상 grid 우측상단의 "저장" 버튼 -- 입력값 모두 필수입력 사항임 -- 정산제외여부를 'Y'로 된 경우 저장버튼 클릭시 아래의 로직을 필수적으로 체크하여 부합될때 update가 되어야 함 -- 1. grid에서 2개 이상의 정상제외여부가 'Y'로 되어 있어야 함 2. 'Y'로 된 행에 대하여 승인번호가 모두 동일하여야 함 3. 'Y'로 된 행에 대하여 사용금액 합계가 0이 되어야 함 */ UPDATE TB_CBCL_OPCS_CARD_USE_IZ /*T:운영비카드사용내역*/ SET OPCS_ADJ_EXCD_YN = (CASE WHEN #{opcsAdjExcdYn} = '정상' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) /*정산제외여부*/ , OPCS_ADJ_SMRY_DV_CD = #{opcsAdjSmryDvCd} /*적요입력-구분*/ , OJ_APY_CN = #{ojApyCn} /*적요입력-대상*/ , USR_SMRY_CN = #{usrSmryCn} /*적요입력-구매품목 및 사용내역*/ WHERE 1=1 AND OPCS_CARD_USE_IZ_ID = #{opcsCardUseIzId} /*운영비카드사용내역ID-정산대상 grid에서 선택된 행*/
mapper.select:
SELECT Y.DGR2_LEVL_OG_NM /*총괄단*/ , Y.DGR3_LEVL_OG_NM /*센터*/ , Y.DST_OJPS_NM /*성명*/ , Y.DST_OJ_PRTNR_NO /*번호*/ , Y.RSB_DV_NM /*직책명*/ , Y.DST_AMT /*운영비정산금액*/ , Y.DST_WHTX /*원천세*/ , Y.ERNTX /*(hidden)소득세*/ , Y.RSDNTX /*(hidden)주민세*/ , (SELECT LISTAGG(S2.CARD_APRNO,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY S2.CARD_APRNO) FROM TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_USE_REL S1 INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_OPCS_CARD_USE_IZ S2 ON S2.BASE_YM = S1.BASE_YM AND S2.OPCS_CARD_USE_IZ_ID = S1.OPCS_CARD_USE_IZ_ID INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_BAS S3 ON S3.BASE_YM = S1.BASE_YM AND S3.OPCS_ADJ_NO = S1.OPCS_ADJ_NO INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_DTL S4 ON S4.OPCS_ADJ_NO = S1.OPCS_ADJ_NO WHERE 1=1 AND S4.DST_OJ_PRTNR_NO = Y.DST_OJ_PRTNR_NO AND S4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND S3.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} /*기준년월*/
AND S3.ADJ_OG_ID = #{dgr1LevlOgId} /*1레벨 조직ID*/
AND S3.ADJ_OG_ID = #{dgr2LevlOgId} /*2레벨 조직ID*/
AND S3.ADJ_OG_ID = #{dgr3LevlOgId} /*3레벨 조직ID*/
GROUP BY S4.DST_OJ_PRTNR_NO) AS CARD_APRNO /*승인번호*/ FROM (SELECT X.DGR2_LEVL_OG_NM /*총괄단*/ , X.DGR3_LEVL_OG_NM /*센터*/ , X.DST_OJPS_NM /*성명*/ , X.DST_OJ_PRTNR_NO /*번호*/ , X.RSB_DV_NM /*직책명*/ , SUM(X.DST_AMT) AS DST_AMT /*운영비정산금액*/ , SUM(X.DST_WHTX) AS DST_WHTX /*원천세*/ , SUM(X.ERNTX) AS ERNTX /*(hidden)소득세*/ , SUM(X.RSDNTX) AS RSDNTX /*(hidden)주민세*/ FROM (SELECT DISTINCT T2.DGR2_LEVL_OG_NM /*총괄단*/ , T2.DGR3_LEVL_OG_NM /*센터*/ , T1.DST_OJPS_NM /*성명*/ , T1.DST_OJ_PRTNR_NO /*번호*/ , (SELECT CD_CNTN FROM T_CMZ_CD_D S1 WHERE S1.TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND S1.CD_ID = 'RSB_DV_CD' AND S1.CD_VLD_VAL = T3.RSB_DV_CD) AS RSB_DV_NM /*직책명*/ , T1.DST_AMT /*운영비정산금액*/ , T1.DST_WHTX /*원천세*/ , T1.ERNTX /*소득세*/ , T1.RSDNTX /*주민세*/ FROM (SELECT B.DST_OJ_OG_TP_CD /*배분대상조직유형코드*/ , B.DST_OJ_PRTNR_NO /*배분대상파트너번호*/ , B.DST_OJPS_NM /*배분대상자명*/ , A.ADJ_OG_ID /*정산조직ID*/ , A.OPCS_ADJ_NO /*운영비정산번호*/ , MAX(B.DST_OJPS_PERF_AMT) AS DST_OJPS_PERF_AMT /*배분대상자실적금액*/ , SUM(B.DST_AMT) AS DST_AMT /*배분금액*/ , SUM(B.DST_WHTX) AS DST_WHTX /*배분원천세*/ , SUM(B.ERNTX) AS ERNTX /*소득세*/ , SUM(B.RSDNTX) AS RSDNTX /*주민세*/ , MAX(A.USE_AMT) AS USE_AMT /*사용금액*/ , MAX(A.BASE_YM) AS BASE_YM /*기준월*/ FROM TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_BAS A /*T:운영비정산기본*/ INNER JOIN TB_CBCL_OPCS_ADJ_DTL B /*T:운영비정산상세*/ ON B.OPCS_ADJ_NO = A.OPCS_ADJ_NO INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ C /*T:월파트너내역*/ ON C.BASE_YM = A.BASE_YM AND C.OG_ID = A.ADJ_OG_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND A.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} /*기준년월*/
AND A.ADJ_OG_ID = #{dgr1LevlOgId} /*1레벨 조직ID*/
AND A.ADJ_OG_ID = #{dgr2LevlOgId} /*2레벨 조직ID*/
AND A.ADJ_OG_ID = #{dgr3LevlOgId} /*3레벨 조직ID*/
AND A.MSCR_YN = 'N' /*유가증권여부*/ GROUP BY B.DST_OJ_OG_TP_CD /*배분대상조직유형코드*/ , B.DST_OJ_PRTNR_NO /*배분대상파트너번호*/ , B.DST_OJPS_NM /*배분대상자명*/ , A.ADJ_OG_ID /*정산조직ID*/ , A.OPCS_ADJ_NO /*운영비정산번호*/ ) T1 INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T2 /*T:월조직내역*/ ON T2.BASE_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND T2.OG_ID = T1.ADJ_OG_ID INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T3 /*T:월파트너내역*/ ON T3.BASE_YM = T1.BASE_YM AND T3.OG_TP_CD = T1.DST_OJ_OG_TP_CD AND T3.PRTNR_NO = T1.DST_OJ_PRTNR_NO WHERE 1=1 ) X WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY X.DGR2_LEVL_OG_NM /*총괄단*/ , X.DGR3_LEVL_OG_NM /*센터*/ , X.DST_OJPS_NM /*성명*/ , X.DST_OJ_PRTNR_NO /*번호*/ , X.RSB_DV_NM /*직책명*/ ) Y WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY Y.DST_AMT DESC
